alert.note: Alert for Mellette; Todd (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 05 at 9:52PM MDT until August 06 at 12:45AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Southeastern Mellette County in south central South Dakota... North Central Todd County in south central South Dakota... * Until 145 AM CDT. * At 1052 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 3 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks, streams and highways as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Northern Rosebud Reservation. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
